name: Purple Berry
description: Purple Berry is an indica-dominant strain that is a cross of Grandaddy Purple and Blueberry. It stays true to its colorful lineage and produces dense green flowers that are streaked with purples and blues, and sometimes pinks and oranges. Purple Berry gives off a sweet smell with just a hint of nuttiness; the taste follows suit with an overwhelmingly Blueberry flavor. This is a heavy indica for sure, but many users report that it is less sedative and allows for some mental alertness while providing a strong body buzz.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Sleepy, Tingly, Uplifted, Pain, Nausea, Cramps, Stress, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious
